author: platinumcitytrip
title: Great place to stay for an event at Parc des Princes/Stade Jean Bouin
text: Walking distance from the sports temples PdP and SJB. And thus walking distances from the nice caf√©s, bars, bistros etc. Good rooms, good breakfast and a chance to run into athletes too (we were there for rugby but had breakfast with the Roland Garros qualifier players.
